title: Apsara Kundan Haaram: Diamond and Gemstone Long Necklace
materials: Hyderabadi Polish. Features high-quality Kundan setting with uncut diamonds (Polki diamonds)
features: Exquisite floral design with intricate Kundan setting. The necklace showcases traditional floral motifs adorned with uncut diamonds and interspersed with vibrant emeralds. A central ruby adds a touch of royalty. The pendant features a larger floral centerpiece with a larger emerald and dangling South Sea pearls, adding a graceful touch. The craftsmanship reflects a perfect blend of Telugu artistry and Mughal influences, creating a truly mesmerizing piece.
colors: with pops of green (emerald) and red (ruby). The pearl white provides a soft contrast.
occasions: and grand festive occasions like Sankranti and Ugadi. Also ideal for significant family celebrations such as Seemantham or half-saree function (Langa Voni function). Suitable for modern high-end events as a statement piece.
description: A timeless masterpiece showcasing superior craftsmanship and traditional Hyderabadi jewelry artistry. The combination of uncut diamonds, vibrant gemstones, and lustrous pearls makes it a valuable heirloom piece. The intricate design and impeccable finish reflect the rich cultural heritage of South India, making it a treasured possession for generations to come. Offers a perfect balance of traditional aesthetics and modern appeal.
